meanings.sent1: The dilatational cream helped soothe the swollen skin.
meanings.sent2: The balloon was dilatational, easily inflating with air.

meanings.sent4: Her dilatational kindness expanded to embrace everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The dilatational flower bloomed beautifully, opening up to the warm sunlight.
